sentence.Network_cn: 用熏蒸的方法给房间消毒

sentence.Network_en: As preventive, spray plants with systemic insecticide or fumigate them regularly.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为预防措施, 要用内吸杀虫剂对植物定期喷洒,或熏蒸.

sentence.Network_en: There are only orchids and irises fumigate your great soul of poetry.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有幽兰和蕙芷,芬芳着一个伟大的诗魂.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'to perfume'): from Latin fumigat- 'fumigated', from the verb fumigare, from fumus 'smoke'

entry.tran: (为除菌、杀虫等用特殊化学药剂)烟熏，熏蒸
entry.def: If you fumigate something, you get rid of germs or insects from it using special chemicals.

example.ex: ...fruit which has been treated with insecticide and fumigated.
example.tran: 喷过杀虫剂并进行了烟熏的水果

means.word_mean: 1. treat with fumes, expose to fumes, especially with the aim of disinfecting or eradicating pests

auth_sentence.content: Now only few hands are needed and a farmer can even sit inside and press a button to irrigate or fumigate an entire field.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now only few hands are needed and a farmer can even sit inside and press a button to irrigate or fumigate an entire field.

auth_sentence.content: There are flaps in the plastic where quarantine workers insert insecticide bombs to fumigate the gear.

sentences.en: The hospital ward was fumigated after the outbreak of typhus.
sentences.cn: 发现斑疹伤寒以后，医院的病房进行了烟熏消毒。
